Package ru.nsu.solovev5.m.task121.matrix

Class Matrix<E>

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.solovev5.m.task121.matrix.Matrix<E>
Type Parameters:
E - the type of elements in this matrix
public class Matrix<E> extends Object
Represents a dynamic matrix.

  • Constructor Details

    • Matrix

      public Matrix()
      Constructs a new empty matrix.

  • Method Details

    • addColumn

      public void addColumn()
      Adds a column in the end of this matrix. Increases the column number. A new column is rowNumber length and filled with null by default.

    • addRow

      public void addRow()
      Adds a row in the end of this matrix. Increases the row number. A new row is columnNumber length and filled with null by default.

    • columnsNumber

      public int columnsNumber()
      Returns a columns number in this matrix.
      Returns:
      a columns number

    • get

      public E get(int row, int column)
      Returns a value of a specific cell of this matrix.
      Parameters:
      row - a row index
      column - a column index
      Returns:
      a matrix item

    • isValidCell

      public boolean isValidCell(int row, int column)
      Combines isValidRow(int) and isValidColumn(int).
      Parameters:
      row - a row index
      column - a column index
      Returns:
      true if given index is valid for this matrix, false otherwise

    • removeColumn

      public ArrayList<E> removeColumn(int column)
      Removes a specific column from this matrix.
      Parameters:
      column - a column index
      Returns:
      the column that was removed from this matrix
      Throws:
      ColumnIndexOutOfBoundsException - if the column index is out of range

    • removeRow

      public ArrayList<E> removeRow(int row)
      Removes a specific row from this matrix.
      Parameters:
      row - a row index
      Returns:
      the row that was removed from this matrix
      Throws:
      RowIndexOutOfBoundsException - if the row index is out of range

    • rowsNumber

      public int rowsNumber()
      Returns a rows number in this matrix.
      Returns:
      a rows number

    • set

      public void set(int row, int column, E item)
      Sets a specific cell of this matrix.
      Parameters:
      row - a row index
      column - a column index
      item - an item to put in the cell

    • isValidRow

      public boolean isValidRow(int row)
      Checks if the given row index is valid for this matrix.
      Parameters:
      row - a row index
      Returns:
      true if row index is valid, false otherwise

    • isValidColumn

      public boolean isValidColumn(int column)
      Checks if the given column index is valid for this matrix.
      Parameters:
      column - a column index
      Returns:
      true if column index is valid, false otherwise
